resources.string: Hello! Please Log In To Start A Tour
Tap Your Phone to Your Tour Guide\'s Phone
This Will Assign You To Your Group
Tap Your Phone to Your Group Members
Begin Tour When You Are Ready
Select A Checkpoint For More Information
Remember To Tap Each Checkpoint Upon Arrival

Tansey Gymnasium is located in the Nelson Recreation Center. Holds indoor athletic games and other events.
Home to Watson Auditorium, a space for showcases, exhibitions, banquets and more.

Beatty Hall houses the Flanagan Campus Center, Douglas D. Schumann Library & Learning Commons, Division of Technical Services, the campus bookstore, the Info Hub, and the Schumann Fitness Center, among other facilities. In short, it is the central hub of Wentworth campus.
Do you know that our Leopard Statue is 6ft tall?

Baker Hall is one of our first year residence hall communities. Baker Hall consists of double and triple bedrooms along a corridor with a common bathroom. Each student receives a bed, desk, desk chair, and bureau with shelves and a bureau with closet space. Baker Hall has a lounge on each floor, a laundry room, and vending machines.

555 Huntington Avenue is home to 364 upperclassmen students and the Center for Community and Learning Partnerships, our division of service learning. This building is designed with 58 suites ranging in occupancy from five to nine residents in single, double, and triple bedrooms. Suites include a common room, kitchen, and one or two bathrooms depending on size.
Here Is The Route To Your Destination
